summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1990 State criminal justice funding act; accepting, appropriating and depositing moneys allocated to the City thereunder; establishing an account in the 1990 Budget of the Department of Finance General therefor; authorizing acquisition of a data processing system for the Law Department by the Department of Administrative Services and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1990 Budget of the Data Processing Development Subfund of the Cumulative Reserve Fund therefor by reimbursable appropriation from the General Fund.
